greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = a(2) = 0, and for n > 2, a(n) = A252463(A252463(n)).
comment: For n >= 3, a(n) gives the contents of the grandparent node of the node containing n in binary trees like A005940 and A163511.
Each number larger than one occurs exactly four times in this sequence.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: For n > 2, if n is even, a(n) = A252463(n/2), otherwise a(n) = A252463(A064989(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 25 2017
